verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> The song הַשִּׁירִ֖ים <S%H7892><s%> of songs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> which [is] Solomon's

יִשָּׁקֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H5401><s%> Let him kiss מִנְּשִׁיק֣וֹת <S%H5390><s%> me with the kisses פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for טוֹבִ֥ים <S%H2896><s%> [is] better דֹּדֶ֖יךָ <S%H1730><s%> for thy love מִיָּֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> than wine

לְרֵ֙יחַ֙ <S%H7381><s%> Because of the savour שְׁמָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H8081><s%> ointments טוֹבִ֔ים <S%H2896><s%> of thy good שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> [is as] ointment תּוּרַ֣ק <S%H7324><s%> poured forth שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עֲלָמ֥וֹת <S%H5959><s%> therefore do the virgins אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <S%H157><s%> love

מָשְׁכֵ֖נִי <S%H4900><s%> Draw אַחֲרֶ֣יךָ <S%H310><s%> after נָּר֑וּצָה <S%H7323><s%> me we will run הֱבִיאַ֨נִי <S%H935><s%> hath brought הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thee the king חֲדָרָ֗יו <S%H2315><s%> me into his chambers נָגִ֤ילָה <S%H1523><s%> we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice בָּ֔ךְ נַזְכִּ֤ירָה <S%H2142><s%> in thee we will remember דֹדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1730><s%> thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> more than wine מֵישָׁרִ֖ים <S%H4339><s%> the upright אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <S%H157><s%> love ס

שְׁחוֹרָ֤ה <S%H7838><s%> I [am] black אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I וְֽנָאוָ֔ה <S%H5000><s%> but comely בְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כְּאָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> as the tents קֵדָ֔ר <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar כִּירִיע֖וֹת <S%H3407><s%> as the curtains שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּרְא֙וּנִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> Look שֶׁאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I שְׁחַרְחֹ֔רֶת <S%H7840><s%> not upon me because I [am] black שֶׁשֱּׁזָפַ֖תְנִי <S%H7805><s%> hath looked הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> because the sun בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> children אִמִּ֣י <S%H517><s%> upon me my mother's נִֽחֲרוּ־ <S%H2787><s%> were angry בִ֗י שָׂמֻ֙נִי֙ <S%H7760><s%> with me they made נֹטֵרָ֣ה <S%H5201><s%> me the keeper אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> of the vineyards כַּרְמִ֥י <S%H3754><s%> [but] mine own vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not נָטָֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H5201><s%> have I not kept

הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> Tell לִּ֗י שֶׁ֤אָהֲבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> loveth נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> me O thou whom my soul אֵיכָ֣ה <S%H349><s%> where תִרְעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> where thou feedest אֵיכָ֖ה <S%H349><s%> how תַּרְבִּ֣יץ <S%H7257><s%> thou makest [thy flock] to rest בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noon שַׁלָּמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> for אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּעֹ֣טְיָ֔ה <S%H5844><s%> why should I be as one that turneth aside עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Beside עֶדְרֵ֥י <S%H5739><s%> by the flocks חֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2270><s%> companion

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵדְעִי֙ <S%H3045><s%> If thou know לָ֔ךְ הַיָּפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> not O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> among women צְֽאִי־ <S%H3318><s%> go thy way forth לָ֞ךְ בְּעִקְבֵ֣י <S%H6119><s%> by the footsteps הַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock וּרְעִי֙ <S%H7462><s%> and feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדִיֹּתַ֔יִךְ <S%H1429><s%> thy kids עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> By מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <S%H4908><s%> tents הָרֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> beside the shepherds' ס

לְסֻסָתִי֙ <S%H5484><s%> to a company of horses בְּרִכְבֵ֣י <S%H7393><s%> chariots פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> in Pharaoh's דִּמִּיתִ֖יךְ <S%H1819><s%> I have compared רַעְיָתִֽי׃ <S%H7474><s%> thee O my love
נָאו֤וּ <S%H4998><s%> are comely לְחָיַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H3895><s%> Thy cheeks בַּתֹּרִ֔ים <S%H8447><s%> with rows צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <S%H6677><s%> [of jewels] thy neck בַּחֲרוּזִֽים׃ <S%H2737><s%> with chains

תּוֹרֵ֤י <S%H8447><s%> thee borders זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> of gold נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> We will make לָּ֔ךְ עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> With נְקֻדּ֥וֹת <S%H5351><s%> with studs הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> of silver

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> While שֶׁ֤הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> While the king בִּמְסִבּ֔וֹ <S%H4524><s%> [sitteth] at his table נִרְדִּ֖י <S%H5373><s%> my spikenard נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> sendeth forth רֵיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7381><s%> the smell

צְר֨וֹר <S%H6872><s%> A bundle הַמֹּ֤ר ׀ <S%H4753><s%> of myrrh דּוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> [is] my wellbeloved לִ֔י בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between שָׁדַ֖י <S%H7699><s%> all night betwixt my breasts יָלִֽין׃ <S%H3885><s%> unto me he shall lie

אֶשְׁכֹּ֨ל <S%H811><s%> [is] unto me [as] a cluster הַכֹּ֤פֶר ׀ <S%H3724><s%> of camphire דּוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> My beloved לִ֔י בְּכַרְמֵ֖י <S%H3754><s%> in the vineyards עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> of Engedi ס

הִנָּ֤ךְ <S%H2005><s%> behold יָפָה֙ <S%H3303><s%> Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <S%H7474><s%> my love הִנָּ֥ךְ <S%H2005><s%> behold יָפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֥יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> eyes יוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H3123><s%> thou [hast] doves'

הִנְּךָ֨ <S%H2005><s%> behold יָפֶ֤ה <S%H3303><s%> Behold thou [art] fair דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> my beloved אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> so נָעִ֔ים <S%H5273><s%> yea pleasant אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed עַרְשֵׂ֖נוּ <S%H6210><s%> also our bed רַעֲנָנָֽה׃ <S%H7488><s%> [is] green
קֹר֤וֹת <S%H6982><s%> The beams בָּתֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1004><s%> of our house אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> [are] cedar [רַחִיטֵנוּ כ] (רַהִיטֵ֖נוּ <S%H7351><s%> rafter ק) בְּרוֹתִֽים׃ <S%H1266><s%> of fir
